presentationColumns.name: # of Bouncebacks
presentationColumns.description: The total Emails that returned a Bounceback (hard or soft).
tags: Project:Fusion Analytics Warehouse - Marketing Campaign Analytics
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - CX - Eloqua Email Activities.# of Bouncebacks

presentationColumns.name: # of Hard Bouncebacks
presentationColumns.description: The total Emails that returned a Hard Bounceback. A hard bounce back is an Email that permanently could not be delivered.
tags: Project:Fusion Analytics Warehouse - Marketing Campaign Analytics
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - CX - Eloqua Email Activities.# of Hard Bouncebacks

presentationColumns.name: # of Soft Bouncebacks
presentationColumns.description: The total Emails that returned a Soft Bounceback. A soft bounce back is an Email that temporarily could not be delivered.
tags: Project:Fusion Analytics Warehouse - Marketing Campaign Analytics
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - CX - Eloqua Email Activities.# of Soft Bouncebacks

presentationColumns.name: # of Email Opens
tags: Project:Fusion Analytics Warehouse - Marketing Campaign Analytics
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - CX - Eloqua Email Activities.# of Email Opens

presentationColumns.name: # of Email Clickthroughs
presentationColumns.description: The total Email Clickthroughs. This includes multiple clicks by the same recipient.
tags: Project:Fusion Analytics Warehouse - Marketing Campaign Analytics
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - CX - Eloqua Email Activities.# of Email Clickthroughs

presentationColumns.name: # of Possible Forwarders
presentationColumns.description: The total original recipients that forwarded the email at least once.
tags: Project:Fusion Analytics Warehouse - Marketing Campaign Analytics
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - CX - Eloqua Email Activities.# of Possible Forwarders

presentationColumns.name: # of Unsubscribes By Email
presentationColumns.description: The total Email recipients that Unsubscribed. (Globally or Spam Unsubscribed)
tags: Project:Fusion Analytics Warehouse - Marketing Campaign Analytics
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - CX - Eloqua Email Activities.# of Unsubscribes By Email

presentationColumns.name: # of Spam Unsubscribers By Email
presentationColumns.description: The total Email recipients that marked the email as Spam.
tags: Project:Fusion Analytics Warehouse - Marketing Campaign Analytics
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - CX - Eloqua Email Activities.# of Spam Unsubscribers By Email

presentationColumns.name: # of Existing Visitor Clickthroughs
presentationColumns.description: The total Email clickthrough by returning visitor.
tags: Project:Fusion Analytics Warehouse - Marketing Campaign Analytics
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - CX - Eloqua Email Activities.# of Existing Visitor Clickthroughs

presentationColumns.name: # of New Visitor Clickthroughs
